name: Scrum.io
shortDescription: Final project of SoyHenry's full stack development bootcamp. Scrum.io is a SCRUM management system, which aims to provide a complete set of tools for both SCRUM Masters and developers.
description:
Scrum.io is a project developed in a team of 7 people and was made as the final project of SoyHenry's full stack development bootcamp. It's a SCRUM management system, designed to provide a set of tools for both SCRUM masters and developers. It includes a lot of features, such as tracking of each developer's perfomance, changes in real time, notifications, interactive poker planning rooms, charts to measure the development of the project (burndown chart and customized statistics), chat in real time, among others. 
 In this project I worked mainly on UI, frontend design and in all the real-time features.

name: Ecommerce bakery
shortDescription: Simple ecommerce with pastry theme. I made this project when I was learning NextJS by self-taught.
description: A simple project I made to investigate about NextJS and understand how it works. In this project I used all the main features of this framework, such as Static Site Generation (SSG), API Routes, CSS-In-JS, among others.

name: Bookmark landing page
shortDescription: Landing page of Bookmark, this is my solution to a challenge from FrontendMentor which I use to improve my knowledges of responsive design and also apply CSS-In-JS with Styled-components.
description: This is my solution to one of the challenges from FrontendMentor, in which I had to recreate the landing page of Bookmark from 0 from a given design. These challenges are very good to improve my CSS & responsive design skills and also gain the ability to recreate a website in HTML/CSS from an image.

name: Personal portfolio
shortDescription: My personal portfolio! The page I made to introduce myself and show the projects I've worked on. This page is intended to be easy-to-understand, fast, functional and practical.
description:
My personal portfolio! The page I made to introduce myself and show the projects I've worked on.
I designed this page to be extremly performant, fast and accessible so that people can easily see my work and contact me.
I chose NextJS as the framework to build this website in order to make it as fast and efficient as possible using all the features it includes such as SSG, optimized images, SSR optimizations, etc.

name: Manage landing page
shortDescription: Landing page of Manage, this is my solution to a challenge from FrontendMentor. Created using HTML5 + Bootstrap.
description: This is my solution to a challenge from Frontend Mentor, in which I had to recreate the landing page of 'Manage'. This challenge was useful to consolidate my knowledge of HTML and CSS layout.

name: React Rock, Paper or Scissors
shortDescription: Classic rock, paper or scissors minigame recreated in React with animations and a user-friendly UI, this is my solution to a challenge from FrontendMentor.
description: This is my solution to a challenge from Frontend Mentor, in which I had to recreate the famous game 'rock, papers or scissors'. This challenge was useful to consolidate my knowledge of animations on CSS & component management on React.

name: Room landing page
shortDescription: Landing page of Room, this is my solution to a challenge from FrontendMentor created using a sophisticated and responsive grid layout.
description: This is my solution to a challenge from Frontend Mentor, in which I had to recreate the landing page of 'Room'. This particular challenge was extremly useful when I was learning about layouts and positioning in CSS.

name: Easy bank landing page
shortDescription: Landing page of Easy Bank. This is my solution to a challenge from FrontendMentor
description: This is my solution to a challenge from Frontend Mentor, in which I had to recreate a whole landing page from an image. This was the first entire project that I built when I started to learn about CSS/HTML layout, responsive design & React.

name: IP tracker
shortDescription: Application that tracks a given IP and show its geolocalization on the map, this is my solution to a challenge from FrontendMentor.
description: This is my solution to a challenge from Frontend Mentor, in which I had to create an app that tracks a given IP address an shows it geolocalization on a map. This challenge was useful to learn how to use and implement external APIs
